title: Sam Altman touts ChatGPT's reaccelerating growth to employees as OpenAI closes in on $100 billion funding
summary_full: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told employees that ChatGPT's monthly growth is back above 10%, as competition ramps up in generative AI.
summary_public: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman told employees that ChatGPT's monthly growth is back above 10%, as competition ramps up in generative AI.
